document.full_text: playoff hockey is bringing out some fun in vancouver, as the waffle-throwing, sign-toting green men are up to their old tricks. but don't count the n.h.l. as fans of the spandex-clad duo.
document.title: canucks' green men playfully invade playoffs
lines_and_colors: playoff hockey is bringing out some fun in vancouver, as the waffle-throwing, sign-toting green men are up to their old tricks. but don't count the n.h.l. as fans of the spandex-clad duo.
